name: A Hat Odyssey
description:
A Platformer game where you control a hat, that controls characters, there is no story.

This game was created for the first Mix and Game Jam, and was the first time i uploaded a game in web, so... if the games gets any errors in web i am sorry. The theme for the game jam was "Dimension Change" so the game is based on Mario Odyssey, and i changed the hat mechanic to 2D.
